meanings.sent1: The dissymmetry of the butterfly's wings caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The artist intentionally created dissymmetry in her painting to evoke emotion.
meanings.sent3: The dissymmetry of the clown's face paint made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The dissymmetry in the garden gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent5: The dissymmetry of the snowflake was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The dissymmetry in the seesaw made it impossible to play.
meanings.sent2: The dissymmetry of flavors in the dish made it unappetizing.
meanings.sent3: The dissymmetry of the juggling act caused the balls to go everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The dissymmetry in the team's strategy led to their defeat.
meanings.sent5: The dissymmetry in the room's design made it feel chaotic.

meanings.definition: Lack of equality in size or shape
meanings.sent1: The dissymmetry of the siblings' heights was noticeable in the family photo.
meanings.sent2: The dissymmetry of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete.
meanings.sent3: The dissymmetry of the cupcakes made them look like mini mountains.
meanings.sent4: The dissymmetry of the clouds created interesting shapes in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The dissymmetry of the tree branches gave the forest a wild appearance.
